p: Paper of the nature of a vise under Act. of July 1884
To the Pursue of the S.S. Olympian

I do hereby vertify that Wong Ruin of the Firm of Yee Yuen & Co Chinese merchant, of this City came to the consulate this day and exhibits to me a certificate of Lang Tiny Tsan, Imperial Chinese Consul General at Lan Francis Co, dated April 6th 1889, with request to the wife of Zee Sing Wob; (whose protograph & that of her husband is thereto attached) now living in this City, who, he states, wishes to join her husband in Lan France Co

I also certify that I believe this statement to be true; that the certificate of the Chinese Consul General is in all respects genuine and that Lee Sing Wats wife, is, as stated, therein, of the exempt class, and entitled to come to the United States
Given under my hand and the seal of this Consulate at Victoria B.C. this eleventh day of April in the year one thousant eight hundred & eighty nine
